data.name: Sharing Lights
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to Sharing Lights!


Enter a strange and dark dungeon designed by the best architect of the entire Kingdom. Firstly created to protect the King's most precious treasures, it is now used as an overly intricated maze where no one ever escaped before. To ensure the dungeon's secrets never unveil, the architect herself has been captured and locked inside her best creation. Find her, and you might have a chance to get out...

Play 4 innocent Ghosts at the same time, manage the light and maybe, find the exit.

FEATURES:

  • 32 levels are waiting for the smartest people to complete.
  • Multiple ways to solve the puzzle.
  • Easy mechanics, it's a game for your brain.
  • Dark dungeon mood.
  • 11 achievments unlocking alongside your progression.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to Sharing Lights!

data.short_description: Gather all your grey matter and enter the dungeon. Sharing Lights is a 3D isometric puzzler in which you control multiple Ghosts at the same time. Manage their lights and use their abilities cleverly to reach the Architect and find the exit.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
